model_answer: The correct timeline is: (1) Black screen displays the text "Welcome to: TEDx Youth@Singapore." (2) A male voice cuts into the guitar music saying, "everybody... This is Hanan." (3) A young boy plays the piano with sheet music on the stand. (4) The speaker asks, "How good at Facebook are you?" while comparing practice time. (5) A black slide reads "Not as successful as: a) He wants to be. b) He can be. c) He should be." (6) A slide shows only the text "c) He should be." Therefore, the answer is A: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.

The correct timeline is: 
1. The speaker recounts starting LEAF and removing a third of classroom lightbulbs to save electricity.
2. The screen shows the slide "Immersion is a Mindset. A Perspective..." (This might be an introduction to the presentation)
3. He says even a baby monkey riding on a pig could inspire their ideas.
4. A photo of a door labeled "DOOR" appears on the screen.
5. He explains they put up a cheesy Uncle Sam poster with a big plastic hand to make people close the door, and it worked.
6. On stage, the presenter holds up a pineapple during his improv example.

Therefore, the correct order is option B: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 6 -> 5
